Dataset¶

A dataset contains a distribution list of individual resources (files, APIs or links that are being shared) as well as metadata.

Metadata is the “Who, What, When, Where, Why” of each dataset. There are a number of specifications for dataset metadata and DKAN currently complies with the DCAT and Project Open Data schemas.

It is possible to add new fields to DKAN to conform to additional specifications or custom requirements.

Sample Data Files¶

  • JSON - Minimum Requirements

  • JSON - With Extended Fields
